tasks: I successfully brought three patented design models into production, demonstrating my ability to deliver innovative, high-impact solutions. These patents include a system for detecting and resolving vehicle stalling on hills in comfort mode, an in-house model for understeering and oversteering detection, and a surface friction detection modelâ€”all of which significantly improved vehicle performance and safety in production

I conducted a thorough data analysis of the vehicle's control system to identify inefficiencies in the surface friction model. By pinpointing key performance gaps, I developed and implemented an in-house solution within three months. This data-driven model improved vehicle efficiency and delivered significant cost savings for the company

Within three months of joining the team, I led the NVIDIA software delivery and integration process, creating a streamlined pipeline that allows for remote flashing of ECUs and ensures software quality checks before deployment in vehicles. This process, which I pioneered, is still in use by the company and has been successfully implemented on-board the vECU systems in vehicles

achievement: EVEREST EXPEDITION for EDUCATION and EMPOWERMENT
tasks: One of my proudest achievements was completing an expedition to Everest Base Camp to raise funds for an orphanage in India. Through this effort, I successfully raised $1,600, which directly supported girls in need of education and shelter, making a meaningful impact on their lives.
